Author: laisserai
Text: Thank you for the comment.   I just feel so violated? Even though nothing happened I'm just super creeped out knowing that someone like that LIVES by me and that hes friends with my family members. :(   Your last comment made me lol, thank you for that:)

Author: hushedbalance
Text: I'm so sorry this happened to you dear. Creepy guys are the bane of my existence. I feel you, sometimes they do shit that's so fucked up and nauseating I just wanna avoid doing any activity that they've tainted. Don't stop this Bob from living your life.  Ohhh I do hope Bob wakes up with anal fissures and a long shift at work.
